items.sentence: That coat may have cost a lot of money, but it's worth it.
Tom occupies one of the leading positions in a large bank.
Tom charged Mary three hundred dollars to paint her fence.
Tom wanted to buy Mary something special for her birthday.
Tom was surprised to find Mary waiting on his front porch.
That isn't something that I want to think about right now.
I wonder whether Tom really wants to go to Boston with us.
I think Tom might leave for Boston early tomorrow morning.
Tom didn't know when Mary was planning on going to Boston.
Didn't you know that Tom doesn't understand French at all?
